Title: Relates to portable solar generation devices
Summary: Defines "portable solar generation device"; exempts portable solar generation devices from interconnection or net metering requirements; requires the state energy conservation construction code to allow for portable solar generation devices to be connected to a building's wiring through an electrical outlet.
LawCode: Amd ยง66-j, Pub Serv L; amd ยง11-104, Energy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the energy law, in relation to portable solar generation devices
